title: 7 N172s for sale with very nice images
author: vwtdi

posts.post_title: 7 N172s for sale with very nice images
posts.post_content:
I've decided to let go of my final 7 N172s. I always bought with image clarity and contrast as the 2 most important factors when deciding on a purchase and I think what I have left are among the best in the hobby. No big names, just top shelf Old Judges. Please email if you want to see the plastic or the backs. Thanks, Keith [url]snoopy1955@comcast.net[/url]

Ferguson SGC 80 sold
[URL=http://s45.photobucket.com/user/vwtdi55/media/56%20card%20baseball%20collection/n172_ferguson882.jpg.html][IMG]http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f92/vwtdi55/56%20card%20baseball%20collection/n172_ferguson882.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Email sent on Ferguson.

Cheers, Mike
